item.title: Breezy forecast ahead for the Suncoast
item.description: Breezy conditions set in by the beginning of the workweek as we track the tropics.

item.title: Judge denies Donna Adelson’s motion for new trial
item.description: A judge denied Donna Adelson’s motion for a new trial on Thursday.

item.title: Beach forecast has sunnier skies but a shower is still possible
Study of 117-year-old’s genes reveals clues to living a long life
item.description: Shortly before she died in 2024, Maria Branyas Morera became the world’s oldest living person.

item.title: Florida to receive millions in reimbursement from Department of Homeland Security
item.description: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis shared remarks on the state’s 287(g) ICE agreements.

item.title: Couple accused of abusing, starving 3 children, including 9-year-old who weighed 30 pounds, police say
item.description: A woman in Ohio and her boyfriend are accused of abusing three young children, including a 9-year-old boy who weighed only 30 pounds with a core body temperature of less than 80 degrees.

item.title: 3 killed, several injured in shooting at waterfront bar in North Carolina
item.description: Officials in North Carolina say someone opened fire on patrons at a waterfront bar, killing three people and injuring several others.

item.title: More than 100 farmers step up to harvest fields for father diagnosed with ALS
item.description: A farming community came together to harvest hundreds of acres for a father struggling with an ALS diagnosis.

item.title: Bradenton tortoises feature in award-winning Floridian’s photo
item.description: The Suncoast boasts a wide variety of wildlife, from native animals to invasive species.

item.title: Bradenton woman hits two poles, dies
item.description: A 25-year-old Bradenton woman died Sunday morning after losing control on Cortez Road.

item.title: Breezy winds for the Suncoast and fair skies starts the week
